alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Jefferson; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 23 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT/2 AM EDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama, Florida and Georgia, including the following areas, in southeast Alabama, Geneva and Houston. In Florida, Calhoun, Central Walton, Coastal Bay, Coastal Dixie, Coastal Franklin, Coastal Gulf, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor, Coastal Wakulla, Gadsden, Holmes, Inland Bay, Inland Dixie, Inland Franklin, Inland Gulf, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Inland Wakulla, Jackson, Lafayette, Leon, Liberty, Madison, North Walton, South Walton and Washington. In Georgia, Brooks, Decatur, Grady, Lanier, Lowndes, Seminole and Thomas. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT/2 AM EDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Pockets of heavy rainfall are expected through this evening across our Florida counties, and our far south Alabama and far south Georgia counties. Local amounts of around 4 inches are possible in a short period of time, leading to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Jefferson; South Walton
